alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the penicillin core structure, which is structurally characterized by a penam ring bearing two methyl groups at position 2, and an amide group at position 6 [starting from the sulfur atom at position 1].
alternative_parents.name: Penicillins

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an alpha amino acid (or a derivative thereof) which bears an acyl group at its terminal nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: N-acyl-alpha amino acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one or more chlorine atoms attached to a benzene moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Chlorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one or more fluorine atoms attached to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Fluorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl fluoride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl fluorides

alternative_parents.description: Heterocyclic compounds containing a five-member saturated aliphatic ring with one nitrogen atom, one sulfur atom, three carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Thiazolidines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an amide derivative of carboxylic acid, with the general structure RN(R1)C(R2)=O (R1-R2 any atom but H).
alternative_parents.name: Tertiary carboxylic acid amides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an aromatic ring where a carbon atom is linked to an hetero atom.
alternative_parents.name: Heteroaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Heterocyclic organic compounds containing an isoxazole moiety, with a structure characterized by a five-member aromatic ring with one oxygen atom and one nitrogen atom at ring positions 1 and 2, respectively.
alternative_parents.name: Isoxazoles

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a secondary carboxylic acid amide functional group, with the general structure RC(=O)N(R')H (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary carboxylic acid amides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a saturated four-member heterocycle where one nitrogen atom replaces a carbon atom.
alternative_parents.name: Azetidines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the thiohemiaminal group with the general structure R1SC(R2)(R3)N(R4)R5 (R1-R5=H, alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Thiohemiaminal derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one oxygen atom linked to a ring carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Oxacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid group with the formula -C(=O)OH.
alternative_parents.name: Carboxylic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds containing a thioether group that is substituted by two alkyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dialkylthioethers

alternative_parents.description: Carboxylic acids containing exactly one carboxyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Monocarboxylic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organonitrogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
alternative_parents.name: Carbonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a fluorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organofluorides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

class.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid group with the formula -C(=O)OH or a derivative thereof.
class.name: Carboxylic acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as dipeptides. These are organic compounds containing a sequence of exactly two alpha-amino acids joined by a peptide bond.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing a sequence of exactly two alpha-amino acids joined by a peptide bond.
direct_parent.name: Dipeptides

intermediate_nodes.description: Compounds containing an amide derived from two or more amino carboxylic acid molecules (the same or different) by formation of a covalent bond from the carbonyl carbon of one to the nitrogen atom of another.
intermediate_nodes.name: Peptides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing an amino acid or a peptide backbone, or derivatives thereof.
subclass.name: Amino acids, peptides, and analogues

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
